name: Halong Bay Discovery - see locals and enjoy professional service 2D1N
description:
Halong Bay, which is voted as the one in seven wonders of the world is a famous tourist destination in the Northeast of Vietnam. the Bay is really like a wonderful picture created by the Nature Mother.

Another area in northeast of Halong Bay is known as Bai Tu Long Bay and is also the focus of our special itinerary. Although it shares many similar geological characters with Halong Bay, Bai Tu Long Bay is considered as off the beaten tourist track with many deserted and pristine beaches, no less impressive karst mountains.
